DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine how psychotherapy and pharmacotherapy respectively change brain activity in patients suffering from chronic depression.
DOC.brief_title: Getting Biased Treatment Study: How Psychotherapy and Antidepressants Change Brain Activity in Chronic Depression
DOC.criteria: Chronic Depression (Double Depression, Chronic MDE, MDE with incomplete remission) HAMD24>20 Concurrent Psychotherapy or Psychopharmacotherapy Previous NonResponse to Duloxetine NonResponse to three Antidepressants of two different groups given at adequate doses or NonResponse to two empirically tested forms of Psychotherapy in the current Depressive Episode Serious Psychiatric comorbidity Serious Neurologic comorbidity Contraindications to Duloxetine Contraindications to fMRI
